attributes.action: Stop Hertfordshire County Council from closing our schools in Hemel Hempstead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hertfordshire County Council have proposed to close Chaulden Infant School and Chaulden Junior school which both have speech and language units, the infants have a nurture class and we have over 70% highlighted vulnerable children and all our staff are highly qualified and specialists in their profession. The closure will leave over 45 staff facing redundancy.Hertfordshire County Council is a Conservative controlled Council and they are trying to blame the Government for these closures. We urge the Prime minister to speak to his cabinet and insist that they look at the school closure drive in Hemel Hempstead, They are planning to build over 12,000 new homes in our town. where are the children going to go to School, Why are vunerable children being targeted?
